name: Tượng Chúa Kito Vua
address: Tượng Chúa Kito Vua, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: The Christ the King statue in Vung Tau is a giant statue of Jesus Christ, offering panoramic views of the city and coastline.

name: Bãi Sau (Back Beach)
description: Bãi Sau, or Back Beach, is one of the most popular beaches in Vung Tau, known for its clean sand and clear waters.

name: Bãi Trước (Front Beach)
description: Bãi Trước, or Front Beach, is a beautiful beach with calm waters, perfect for swimming and relaxing.

name: Mũi Nghinh Phong
address: Mũi Nghinh Phong, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: Mũi Nghinh Phong is a scenic point in Vung Tau, offering stunning views of the ocean and a cool breeze.

name: Ngọn Hải Đăng Vũng Tàu
address: Ngọn Hải Đăng, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: The Vung Tau Lighthouse is an iconic landmark providing spectacular views of the surrounding area and the coastline.

name: Tắm biển Vũng Tàu
description: Vung Tau is famous for its beautiful beaches, ideal for swimming, relaxing, and enjoying fresh seafood.

name: Chùa Thiền Lâm
address: Chùa Thiền Lâm, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: Chùa Thiền Lâm is a peaceful Buddhist temple with stunning architecture and serene surroundings.

name: Khu du lịch Hồ Mây
address: Khu du lịch Hồ Mây, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: Hồ Mây Park is an amusement park located on a hill, offering panoramic views, entertainment, and recreational activities.

name: Suối Tiên
description: Suối Tiên is a beautiful waterfall surrounded by lush greenery, a peaceful spot to relax and enjoy nature.

name: Bãi Dâu
description: Bãi Dâu is a peaceful beach in Vung Tau, offering a quiet and serene atmosphere for visitors to unwind.

name: Bảo tàng Vũ khí cổ
address: Bảo tàng Vũ khí cổ, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: The Vung Tau Museum of Antique Weapons showcases a collection of historical weapons and artifacts from various periods.

name: Khu du lịch Hồ Đá Xanh
address: Hồ Đá Xanh, Vũng Tàu, Vietnam
description: Hồ Đá Xanh is an eco-tourism site offering activities like swimming, hiking, and enjoying the scenic beauty of the area.
